name: Before the Cat
description:
This is a nearly complete collection of all the games I've released before 2021. Some of these used to be available on my webpage, but they were under a different alias, so I feel like they don't really fit anymore. That being said, I still wanted them to be available somewhere, hence the idea for this collection.

Also included are source codes whenever available. I figure, these games are old enough now that I feel comfortable with people digging into them. It's worth noting that a few of these games were made with Game Maker in versions that are probably obsolete today, so it might be a challenge to look into.

In addition, I've decided to include a few unfinished games that I think had potential, but unfortunately never had the drive to finish. This is some really emotional stuff for me, for years I beat myself up over not being able to finish anything. It wasn't until recently I found the courage to finish game development projects, so for me this is a way of casting off the baggage of the past.

As you can see, this collection is very personal to me. My ultimate hope is that I can maybe inspire other people who were in the same position as me, to see that it is possible to move forward despite the entire universe telling you no.

Thank you for everything.
